summary: A bigot is a person who is intolerant of opinions, lifestyles, or identities that are different from his or her own.
full_text: In English the word "bigot" refers to a person whose habitual state of mind includes an obstinate, irrational, or unfair intolerance of ideas, opinions, ethnicities, or beliefs that differ from their own, and intolerance of the people who hold them.
title: Bigotry
